Nudist_0.Name: Nudist
Nudist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. {PAWN_pronoun} can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.

Bloodlust_0.Name: Bloodlust
Bloodlust_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. {PAWN_pronoun} is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.

Kind_0.Name: Kind
Kind_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person. {PAWN_pronoun} rarely insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} also never judges people by their appearance. {PAWN_possessive} agreeableness also makes {PAWN_objective} more likely to conform to prevailing opinions.

Psychopath_0.Name: Psychopath
Psychopath_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother {PAWN_objective} at all. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} also feels no mood boost from socializing.

Cannibal_0.Name: Cannibal
Cannibal_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, {PAWN_pronoun} tried it... and {PAWN_pronoun} liked it.

Abrasive_0.Name: Abrasive
Abrasive_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} always says exactly what's on {PAWN_possessive} mind, especially if it's bugging {PAWN_objective}. That tends to rub people the wrong way.

TooSmart_0.Name: Too smart
TooSmart_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is too smart for {PAWN_possessive} own good. {PAWN_pronoun} learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.

Brawler_0.Name: Brawler
Brawler_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} likes to fight up close and personal. {PAWN_possessive} accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but {PAWN_pronoun}'ll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.

Masochist_0.Name: Masochist
Masochist_0.Description: For {PAWN_nameDef}, there's something exciting about getting hurt. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't know why, {PAWN_pronoun}'s just wired differently.

NightOwl_0.Name: Night owl
NightOwl_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

{PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

{PAWN_pronoun} doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.

Greedy_0.Name: Greedy
Greedy_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} needs a really impressive bedroom. {PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood loss if {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't get what {PAWN_pronoun} wants.

Jealous_0.Name: Jealous
Jealous_0.Description: For {PAWN_nameDef}, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. {PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.

Ascetic_0.Name: Ascetic
Ascetic_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. {PAWN_pronoun} will become unhappy if {PAWN_pronoun} has a bedroom that's too impressive. {PAWN_pronoun} also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. {PAWN_pronoun} never judges others by their appearance.

Gay_0.Name: Gay
Gay_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is romantically attracted to people of {PAWN_possessive} own gender.

Bisexual_0.Name: Bisexual
Bisexual_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is romantically attracted to both men and women.

Asexual_0.Name: Asexual
Asexual_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.

AnnoyingVoice_0.Name: Annoying voice
AnnoyingVoice_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and {PAWN_pronoun} tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike {PAWN_objective}.

CreepyBreathing_0.Name: Creepy breathing
CreepyBreathing_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.

Pyromaniac_0.Name: Pyromaniac
Pyromaniac_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves fire. {PAWN_pronoun} will never extinguish fires, and will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. {PAWN_pronoun} will be happy around flames, and happier when wielding an incendiary weapon.

Wimp_0.Name: Wimp
Wimp_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize {PAWN_objective}.

Nimble_0.Name: Nimble
Nimble_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. {PAWN_pronoun} seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.

Nimble_2.Name: Deftly dodger
Nimble_2.Description: [PAWN_name] has cat-like reflexes, and excels at evading attacks.

Nimble_-1.Name: Sluggish
Nimble_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] is not very good at getting out of the way of blows.

FastLearner_0.Name: Fast learner
FastLearner_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a knack for learning. {PAWN_pronoun} picks things up much faster than others.

SlowLearner_0.Name: Slow learner
SlowLearner_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is slow on the uptake. {PAWN_pronoun} learns much slower than others.

Undergrounder_0.Name: Undergrounder
Undergrounder_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no need to experience the outdoors or light. {PAWN_pronoun} will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever and is not bothered by darkness. However, {PAWN_nameDef} will be unhappy while outdoors.

Transhumanist_0.Name: Body modder
Transhumanist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} feels limited in {PAWN_possessive} feeble human body. {PAWN_pronoun} often dreams of being enhanced with artificial body parts or xenogenetics.

BodyPurist_0.Name: Body purist
BodyPurist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes the human body is limited for a reason. To {PAWN_objective}, artificial body parts and xenogenes are unethical and disgusting.

GreatMemory_0.Name: Great memory
GreatMemory_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a fantastic memory for detail. {PAWN_pronoun} will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.

Tough_0.Name: Tough
Tough_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. {PAWN_pronoun} takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. {PAWN_pronoun} is extremely hard to kill.

TorturedArtist_0.Name: Tortured artist
TorturedArtist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. {PAWN_pronoun} will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.

Gourmand_0.Name: Gourmand
Gourmand_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s life revolves around food. {PAWN_pronoun} gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.

QuickSleeper_0.Name: Quick sleeper
QuickSleeper_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether {PAWN_pronoun}'s sleeping on a bed or on the ground, {PAWN_pronoun} will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.

SpeedOffset_-1.Name: Slowpoke
SpeedOffset_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] is always falling behind the group whenever [PAWN_pronoun] goes anywhere.

SpeedOffset_1.Name: Fast walker
SpeedOffset_1.Description: [PAWN_name] likes to be where [PAWN_pronoun]'s going. [PAWN_pronoun] walks quicker than most people.

SpeedOffset_2.Name: Jogger
SpeedOffset_2.Description: [PAWN_name] always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.

DrugDesire_2.Name: Chemical fascination
DrugDesire_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. [PAWN_pronoun] will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.

DrugDesire_1.Name: Chemical interest
DrugDesire_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. [PAWN_pronoun] will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.

DrugDesire_-1.Name: Teetotaler
DrugDesire_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. [PAWN_pronoun] strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.

NaturalMood_2.Name: Sanguine
NaturalMood_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is just naturally upbeat about [PAWN_possessive] situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.

NaturalMood_1.Name: Optimist
NaturalMood_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get [PAWN_objective] down.

NaturalMood_-1.Name: Pessimist
NaturalMood_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] tends to look on the bad side of life.

NaturalMood_-2.Name: Depressive
NaturalMood_-2.Description: [PAWN_name] is perenially unhappy. [PAWN_pronoun] has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.

Nerves_2.Name: Iron-willed
Nerves_2.Description: [PAWN_name]'s will is an iron shield. [PAWN_pronoun] keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.

Nerves_1.Name: Steadfast
Nerves_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.

Nerves_-2.Name: Volatile
Nerves_-2.Description: [PAWN_name] is on a hair-trigger all the time. [PAWN_pronoun] is the first to break in any tough situation.

Neurotic_1.Name: Neurotic
Neurotic_1.Description: [PAWN_name] likes to have things squared away. [PAWN_pronoun] will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but [PAWN_possessive] nerves can get the better of [PAWN_objective].

Neurotic_2.Name: Very neurotic
Neurotic_2.Description: [PAWN_name] feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. [PAWN_pronoun] will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but [PAWN_possessive] nerves can easily get the better of [PAWN_objective].

Industriousness_2.Name: Industrious
Industriousness_2.Description: [PAWN_name] has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.

Industriousness_1.Name: Hard worker
Industriousness_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.

Industriousness_-2.Name: Slothful
Industriousness_-2.Description: [PAWN_name] loves idleness and hates anything productive. [PAWN_pronoun] moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.

PsychicSensitivity_2.Name: Psychically hypersensitive
PsychicSensitivity_2.Description: [PAWN_name]'s mind is like a psychic tuning fork. [PAWN_pronoun] is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.

PsychicSensitivity_1.Name: Psychically sensitive
PsychicSensitivity_1.Description: [PAWN_name]'s mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.

PsychicSensitivity_-1.Name: Psychically dull
PsychicSensitivity_-1.Description: [PAWN_name]'s mind is psychically out of tune with others. [PAWN_pronoun] isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.

PsychicSensitivity_-2.Name: Psychically deaf
PsychicSensitivity_-2.Description: [PAWN_name]'s mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. [PAWN_pronoun] just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.

Beauty_2.Name: Beautiful
Beauty_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to [PAWN_objective] before [PAWN_pronoun] even opens [PAWN_possessive] mouth.

Beauty_1.Name: Pretty
Beauty_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like [PAWN_objective].

Beauty_-1.Name: Ugly
Beauty_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.

Beauty_-2.Name: Staggeringly ugly
Beauty_-2.Description: [PAWN_name] is staggeringly ugly. [PAWN_possessive] face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at [PAWN_objective] while conversing.

Immunity_1.Name: Super-immune
Immunity_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has a naturally powerful immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.

Immunity_-1.Name: Sickly
Immunity_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] has an awful immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.

Delicate_0.Name: Delicate
Delicate_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has fragile skin and bones. {PAWN_pronoun} takes more damage than other people from the same blows.

Recluse_0.Name: Recluse
Recluse_0.Description: The fewer people in {PAWN_nameDef}'s faction, the happier {PAWN_pronoun} is. Being alone is best of all.

PerfectMemory_0.Name: Perfect memory
PerfectMemory_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has outstanding memory, both in terms of retaining information but also muscle memory. {PAWN_possessive} skills will never decay.

Occultist_0.Name: Occultist
Occultist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has deep knowledge of the twisted patterns of dark psychic energy. {PAWN_pronoun} can study unnatural entities faster than others. {PAWN_pronoun} will also periodically teach this inhuman knowledge to others when {PAWN_pronoun} gets the chance.

Joyous_0.Name: Joyous
Joyous_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has the ability to make everyone feel better and inspire them to be the best version of themselves.

BodyMastery_0.Name: Body mastery
BodyMastery_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't have basic needs like eating, sleeping, or comfort. {PAWN_possessive} body is driven by some unknown mechanism, which has turned {PAWN_possessive} eyes completely white.

Disturbing_0.Name: Disturbing
Disturbing_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a peculiar person who seems fixated on horrendous ideas. Talking to {PAWN_objective} is often upsetting.

VoidFascination_0.Name: Void fascination
VoidFascination_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is strangely intrigued by unnatural entities and is easily enthralled by them.

HVT_Everliving_0.Name: Everliving
HVT_Everliving_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} regenerates from any injury due to some unknown mechanism. Even if {PAWN_pronoun} dies, there is a chance {PAWN_pronoun} will come back to life shortly thereafter, so long as {PAWN_possessive} body is intact.

HVT_Vanquisher_0.Name: Vanquisher
HVT_Vanquisher_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has an uncanny sixth sense for weak spots, allowing {PAWN_objective} to topple buildings, strike through armor, and hobble unnatural entities with ease.

HVT_Compromised_0.Name: Compromised
HVT_Compromised_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} underwent psycho-technological reprogramming by an insidious cult. If {PAWN_pronoun} gets too close to a member of the Cult of Horax, there is a chance for {PAWN_possessive} programming to reactivate, causing {PAWN_objective} to instantly join them.

HVT_Pathogenic_0.Name: Pathogenic
HVT_Pathogenic_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} carries dozens, if not hundreds, of different strains of disease within {PAWN_possessive} body. {PAWN_possessive} mere presence often leads to disease outbreaks.

HVT_ChanshiGene_0.Name: Chanshi gene
HVT_ChanshiGene_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has the Meditation Metabolism archite gene, allowing {PAWN_objective} to use any meditation focus type.

HVT_Anarchist_0.Name: Anarchist
HVT_Anarchist_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} dislikes social pecking orders. {PAWN_pronoun} hates those who hold leadership positions, and disapproves of alliance with imperial institutions.

If imprisoned, {PAWN_pronoun} will be uncooperative with {PAWN_possessive} captors.

HVT_Servile_0.Name: Servile
HVT_Servile_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} wants to be led by others, and dislikes holding authority {PAWN_objective}self.

If imprisoned, {PAWN_pronoun} will be quite cooperative with {PAWN_possessive} captors.

HVT_PsychicallyBlank_0.Name: Psychic blank
HVT_PsychicallyBlank_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} dampens nearby psychic phenomena and is immensely resistant to direct psychic interference.

HVT_LatentPsychic_1.Name: Latent psychic
HVT_LatentPsychic_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has an innate connection to the archotechs. This connection might awaken if [PAWN_pronoun] experiences something sufficiently grand or terrible, permanently transforming [PAWN_objective] into a powerful psycaster.

HVT_LatentPsychic_2.Name: Latent psychic
HVT_LatentPsychic_2.Description: [PAWN_name] has an innate connection to the archotechs. This connection might awaken if [PAWN_pronoun] experiences something sufficiently grand or terrible, permanently transforming [PAWN_objective] into a powerful psycaster.

HVT_LatentPsychic_3.Name: Latent psychic
HVT_LatentPsychic_3.Description: [PAWN_name] has an innate connection to the archotechs. This connection might awaken if [PAWN_pronoun] experiences something sufficiently grand or terrible, permanently transforming [PAWN_objective] into a powerful psycaster.

HVT_LatentPsychic_4.Name: Latent psychic
HVT_LatentPsychic_4.Description: [PAWN_name] has an innate connection to the archotechs. This connection might awaken if [PAWN_pronoun] experiences something sufficiently grand or terrible, permanently transforming [PAWN_objective] into a powerful psycaster.

HVT_LatentPsychic_5.Name: Latent psychic
HVT_LatentPsychic_5.Description: [PAWN_name] has an innate connection to the archotechs. This connection might awaken if [PAWN_pronoun] experiences something sufficiently grand or terrible, permanently transforming [PAWN_objective] into a powerful psycaster.

HVT_LatentPsychic_6.Name: Latent psychic
HVT_LatentPsychic_6.Description: [PAWN_name] has an innate connection to the archotechs. This connection might awaken if [PAWN_pronoun] experiences something sufficiently grand or terrible, permanently transforming [PAWN_objective] into a powerful psycaster.

HVT_AwakenedAugur_0.Name: Awakened augur
HVT_AwakenedAugur_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a powerful psycaster with exceptional sensitivity to perturbations in the psychic field.

HVT_AwakenedChanshi_0.Name: Awakened chanshi
HVT_AwakenedChanshi_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} can use any meditation type. {PAWN_pronoun} gains psyfocus faster from meditating, and meditating takes care of {PAWN_possessive} basic needs.

HVT_AwakenedDeluge_0.Name: Awakened deluge
HVT_AwakenedDeluge_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is capable of using nearly any 1st-level psycast without expending psyfocus, so long as {PAWN_pronoun} has enough psyfocus to cast it in the first place.

HVT_AwakenedErudite_0.Name: Awakened erudite
HVT_AwakenedErudite_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is an exceptionally versatile psycaster with a wide array of abilities. {PAWN_pronoun} may also develop up to two more transcendences than other awakened psychics.

HVT_AwakenedIncarnate_0.Name: Awakened incarnate
HVT_AwakenedIncarnate_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} grows physically and mentally stronger with every psycast {PAWN_pronoun} learns.

HVT_AwakenedLuminary_0.Name: Awakened luminary
HVT_AwakenedLuminary_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} exudes an aura that empowers psycasting.

HVT_AwakenedMantraist_0.Name: Awakened mantraist
HVT_AwakenedMantraist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a powerful psycaster, capable of passively generating psyfocus.

HVT_AwakenedPerennial_0.Name: Awakened perennial
HVT_AwakenedPerennial_0.Description: Once a day, {PAWN_nameDef} can draw upon a confluence of power within the psychic field, greatly enhancing {PAWN_possessive} psycasting for an hour.

HVT_AwakenedSage_0.Name: Awakened sage
HVT_AwakenedSage_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a powerful psycaster with a vastly improved neural heat capacity and an exceptionally disciplined mind.

HVT_AwakenedTitan_0.Name: Awakened titan
HVT_AwakenedTitan_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} reinforces {PAWN_possessive} body with accumulated psyfocus, improving {PAWN_possessive} capabilities and defenses.

HVT_AwakenedUndying_0.Name: Awakened undying
HVT_AwakenedUndying_0.Description: Instead of harming {PAWN_objective}, damage taken by {PAWN_nameDef} depletes {PAWN_possessive} psyfocus (at a ratio of 4.5 damage to 1% psyfocus).

HVT_TTraitAlbatross_0.Name: Psychic albatross
HVT_TTraitAlbatross_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} hovers, negating movement penalties from the terrain, and {PAWN_pronoun} also gains armor based on the current wind level. While meditating, {PAWN_pronoun} causes the wind to howl.

HVT_TTraitAnaconda_0.Name: Psychic anaconda
HVT_TTraitAnaconda_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} grows in size and strength over time. This has no upper limit, and increases {PAWN_possessive} strength, speed, and (up to a point) damage resistance; however, it also makes {PAWN_possessive} easier to hit and worse at avoiding traps.

HVT_TTraitAnimalume_0.Name: Psychic animalume
HVT_TTraitAnimalume_0.Description: Every 1000% psyfocus {PAWN_nameDef} spends summons an anima tree somewhere nearby. If {PAWN_pronoun} dies, {PAWN_pronoun} will instantly respawn at a nearby anima tree, killing the tree.

HVT_TTraitApocriton_0.Name: Psychic apocriton
HVT_TTraitApocriton_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} can exert a form of mind control on mechanoids. When {PAWN_pronoun} affects mechanoids with a psycast, they may become allied with {PAWN_objective} for up to an hour. The heavier the mech, the less likely this is to work.

In the absence of an active mechhive, archites in {PAWN_possessive} body will slowly synthesize various mechanoid chips.

HVT_TTraitArcturan_0.Name: Psychic arcturan
HVT_TTraitArcturan_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} warps nearby electromagnetic currents. {PAWN_pronoun} inflicts EMPs via attacks and psycasts, is immune to EMPs {PAWN_objective}self, and has improved sight. This control over electric currents even extends to {PAWN_possessive} own organs, protecting {PAWN_objective} against heart attacks and some forms of coma.

HVT_TTraitBeaver_0.Name: Psychic beaver
HVT_TTraitBeaver_0.Description: Aided by a psychic sense, {PAWN_nameDef} can easily visualize how to assemble or break down objects in {PAWN_possessive} immediate vicinity. {PAWN_possessive} psychic sensitivity increases up the rate at which {PAWN_pronoun} works with plants and buildings, and affects how much damage {PAWN_pronoun} does to buildings.

HVT_TTraitBellbird_0.Name: Psychic bellbird
HVT_TTraitBellbird_0.Description: Word psycasts used by {PAWN_nameDef} cost +7.5% psyfocus, but affect all nearby valid targets. The radius of this effect is equal to twice {PAWN_possessive} psylink level.

HVT_TTraitBluejay_0.Name: Psychic bluejay
HVT_TTraitBluejay_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is surrounded by a protective immaterial presence, which attacks nearby foes and attempts to divert incoming blows.

HVT_TTraitBouldermit_0.Name: Psychic bouldermit
HVT_TTraitBouldermit_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} generates rock chunks with each psycast (and sometimes also makes more valuable metallic resources). On using a psycast of the highest level, there is a 10% chance a meteorite will fall somewhere nearby.

HVT_TTraitBowerbird_0.Name: Psychic bowerbird
HVT_TTraitBowerbird_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} emits a healing skipshield while meditating. The healing applies to everything in its radius, not just {PAWN_possessive} allies.

HVT_TTraitBudgerigar_0.Name: Psychic budgie
HVT_TTraitBudgerigar_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a far-reaching psychic influence that gradually improves relations with other factions.

HVT_TTraitCanary_0.Name: Psychic canary
HVT_TTraitCanary_0.Description: Word psycasts used by {PAWN_nameDef} have a profound influence on the target, breaking unwavering loyalty, reducing resistance, and altering mood and certainty.

HVT_TTraitCassowary_0.Name: Psychic cassowary
HVT_TTraitCassowary_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} deals 2.2x damage with persona weapons, further increased by {PAWN_possessive} own psychic sensitivity.

HVT_TTraitCockatiel_0.Name: Psychic cockatiel
HVT_TTraitCockatiel_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a font of genius. {PAWN_pronoun} passively contributes to research at a rate scaling with {PAWN_possessive} psychic sensitivity; if no research is currently underway, {PAWN_pronoun} instead gradually increases in skill and psyfocus.

HVT_TTraitCockroach_0.Name: Psychic cockroach
HVT_TTraitCockroach_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} regenerates from wounds, even permanent ones, unnaturally fast. {PAWN_pronoun} can even come back from death, taking somewhere between 3-15 days.

HVT_TTraitCranchiid_0.Name: Psychic cranchiid
HVT_TTraitCranchiid_0.Description: While in water, {PAWN_nameDef} moves faster and heals rapidly.

HVT_TTraitCrane_0.Name: Psychic crane
HVT_TTraitCrane_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves with unearthly grace. {PAWN_pronoun} can walk with surety in the most treacherous bog, and evade even the fastest blows with ease.

HVT_TTraitCuckoo_0.Name: Psychic cuckoo
HVT_TTraitCuckoo_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} psychically influences others to love {PAWN_objective} more than almost anything else in existence.

HVT_TTraitDeimatic_0.Name: Deimatic psychic
HVT_TTraitDeimatic_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} repels vectors of harm on an abstract, indirect level. {PAWN_possessive} mere existence has a 50% chance to prevent many kinds of bad events from happening.

Has no effect on events that occur as part of quests.

HVT_TTraitDiabolus_0.Name: Psychic diabolus
HVT_TTraitDiabolus_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is all but immune to high temperatures. In close-range combat, {PAWN_pronoun} repeatedly unleashes flame novas, and {PAWN_possessive} psycasts drench hostile entities and structures in chemfuel.

HVT_TTraitDove_0.Name: Psychic dove
HVT_TTraitDove_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} emits a continuous psychic soothe. {PAWN_possessive} psycasts remove mental breaks from anyone affected.

HVT_TTraitDulotic_0.Name: Dulotic psychic
HVT_TTraitDulotic_0.Description: Anyone whom {PAWN_nameDef} kills is shortly thereafter raised in {PAWN_possessive} service. This second life only lasts for three days; psychically deaf individuals, as well as those who are already under this effect, cannot be raised in this way.

HVT_TTraitEchinoid_0.Name: Psychic echinoid
HVT_TTraitEchinoid_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} radiates an aura of pain, and is unable to feel it {PAWN_objective}self. Foes who stay within the aura for too long also begin to lose consciousness.

HVT_TTraitEiderduck_0.Name: Psychic eiderduck
HVT_TTraitEiderduck_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} regulates ambient temperature, enabling {PAWN_possessive} allies to survive extreme heat or cold, and protecting them from fire.

HVT_TTraitElectrophorus_0.Name: Psychic electrophorus
HVT_TTraitElectrophorus_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} emanates electrical disturbances, charging nearby batteries, calling lightning on nearby foes with each psycast, and sending EMPs through anything {PAWN_pronoun} hits in melee.

HVT_TTraitAptenodytes_0.Name: Psychic emperor penguin
HVT_TTraitAptenodytes_0.Description: Whenever {PAWN_nameDef} undergoes an event that would awaken a latent psychic, a man in black appears. If {PAWN_pronoun} fulfills a condition that would awaken a latent psychic, there is a persistent but very small chance for men in black to appear nearby.

HVT_TTraitEvergreen_0.Name: Evergreen psychic
HVT_TTraitEvergreen_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} ages so slowly as to be immortal. This effect also prevents {PAWN_objective} from developing cancer or geriatric diseases, and it reduces {PAWN_possessive} reliance on food and rest.

HVT_TTraitFirefly_0.Name: Psychic firefly
HVT_TTraitFirefly_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} generates unique solar pinholes with each psycast - the light they emit debilitates foes that get too close. {PAWN_pronoun} can also see just fine in the dark, and is sustained by an exotic process akin to photosynthesis, greatly slowing {PAWN_possessive} hunger so long as {PAWN_pronoun} is in bright light.

HVT_TTraitFirehawk_0.Name: Psychic firehawk
HVT_TTraitFirehawk_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is favored by the flame. {PAWN_pronoun} is all but immune to high temperatures. While meditating, {PAWN_pronoun} emanates heat. {PAWN_possessive} psycasts can set nearby foes ablaze and inflict heatstroke on the victims; when {PAWN_pronoun} strikes, {PAWN_possessive} victims are scalded.

HVT_TTraitFlamingo_0.Name: Psychic flamingo
HVT_TTraitFlamingo_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is immune to fire, poison, and most environmental phenomena.

HVT_TTraitFodiator_0.Name: Psychic fodiator
HVT_TTraitFodiator_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} can induce sudden and unnatural movements in {PAWN_possessive} body, making {PAWN_objective} faster and better at dodging, allowing {PAWN_objective} to travel much farther with jump abilities, and even allowing {PAWN_objective} to leap great distances under {PAWN_possessive} own power.

This power appears to be gravitic in nature, allowing {PAWN_objective} to cancel out the destructive effects of a gravship lift-off. To do this, {PAWN_pronoun} must remain on the ground while the ship takes off.

HVT_TTraitFossil_0.Name: Fossilized psychic
HVT_TTraitFossil_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has had {PAWN_possessive} entire body replaced and augmented by a cyber-organic, archite-empowered material. {PAWN_pronoun} no longer bleeds, surgeries cannot fail on {PAWN_objective}, and {PAWN_possessive} bodily functions are greatly enhanced.

{PAWN_possessive} psychic potential has been stymied as a result of this change; {PAWN_pronoun} can no longer gain new transcendences.

HVT_TTraitFulmar_0.Name: Psychic fulmar
HVT_TTraitFulmar_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} can infrequently generate and fire arcing explosive projectiles over extreme distances.

HVT_TTraitGlowworm_0.Name: Psychic glowworm
HVT_TTraitGlowworm_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} causes ruptures in the fabric of space whenever {PAWN_pronoun} uses a skip psycast, damaging everything that isn't an ally between and around the target points. If {PAWN_pronoun} chooses for a skip psycast's start and end points to be the same (or uses a skip psycast with a random destination), the the effect occurs only once, around the initial point, but its radius increases to that of {PAWN_possessive} psylink level.

HVT_TTraitGnat_0.Name: Psychic gnat
HVT_TTraitGnat_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is immune to the harmful effects of most gases. {PAWN_pronoun} turns invisible while surrounded by gas, and {PAWN_possessive} psycasts skip particulate into affected foes' eyes.

HVT_TTraitGoldfinch_0.Name: Psychic goldfinch
HVT_TTraitGoldfinch_0.Description: Once a day, every day, {PAWN_nameDef} regenerates towards a state of perfect health, becomes immune to the next instance of damage taken, and experiences a brief burst of euphoria. Even {PAWN_possessive} worn apparel and wielded weapons are partially repaired each time this occurs.

HVT_TTraitHaast_0.Name: Haastian psychic
HVT_TTraitHaast_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a giant among psycasters, boasting massively expanded psychic sensitivity and passive psyfocus regeneration.

HVT_TTraitHarbinger_0.Name: Psychic harbinger
HVT_TTraitHarbinger_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} can eat corpses to gain some of their skill experience, as well as potentially heal {PAWN_objective}self of an injury or ailment. The chance to heal scales with the corpse's body size. Moreover, {PAWN_pronoun} defers incoming damage to nearby corpses or undead entities.

HVT_TTraitHeron_0.Name: Psychic heron
HVT_TTraitHeron_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves faster, and has doubled range with skip psycasts.

HVT_TTraitHoneybee_0.Name: Psychic honeybee
HVT_TTraitHoneybee_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} produces food as a byproduct of psycasting. This ability seems to work on a small but constant level within {PAWN_possessive} own body, helping sustain {PAWN_objective}.

HVT_TTraitHornet_0.Name: Psychic hornet
HVT_TTraitHornet_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} can emit neural heat in the form of blasts of explosive energy, even while {PAWN_pronoun} is performing other tasks. This attack's range scales with {PAWN_possessive} psychic sensitivity.

HVT_TTraitHummingbird_0.Name: Psychic hummingbird
HVT_TTraitHummingbird_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} becomes invisible if {PAWN_pronoun} hasn't attacked or cast an ability recently.

HVT_TTraitIndigo_0.Name: Psychic indigo bunting
HVT_TTraitIndigo_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has enhanced eyesight. {PAWN_pronoun} never gets bored of watching the stars, and using the telescope for long enough can cause a good event to occur.

HVT_TTraitIvy_0.Name: Psychic ivy
HVT_TTraitIvy_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} accelerates the growth of nearby plants and causes them to entangle nearby foes.

HVT_TTraitJackdaw_0.Name: Psychic jackdaw
HVT_TTraitJackdaw_0.Description: As {PAWN_nameDef} meditates, {PAWN_pronoun} gets closer to creating a random good event.

HVT_TTraitKea_0.Name: Psychic kea
HVT_TTraitKea_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} gains experience in each skill when psycasting or meditating.

HVT_TTraitKingfisher_0.Name: Psychic kingfisher
HVT_TTraitKingfisher_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has impeccable accuracy - {PAWN_pronoun} nearly always hits {PAWN_possessive} intended target, and can find the weakest spot in virtually any armor.

HVT_TTraitKnapweed_0.Name: Psychic knapweed
HVT_TTraitKnapweed_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} drains the life from nearby plants to replenish {PAWN_possessive} own vitality, and {PAWN_pronoun} siphons psyfocus over time from nearby hostile psycasters.

HVT_TTraitLadybug_0.Name: Psychic ladybug
HVT_TTraitLadybug_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} inflicts heightened regeneration, toughness, and disease resistance on nearby allies.

HVT_TTraitLeghorn_0.Name: Psychic leghorn
HVT_TTraitLeghorn_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} periodically skips high-quality meals to {PAWN_possessive} own location. While meditating, {PAWN_possessive} meditation focus gain rate speeds up this process.

HVT_TTraitLocust_0.Name: Psychic locust
HVT_TTraitLocust_0.Description: Every 24 hours, {PAWN_nameDef} manifests random allies - the higher {PAWN_possessive} psychic sensitivity, the more allies are created. They're fragile and will disappear after 24 hours, but they're more psychically sensitive, and they don't need to eat or sleep.

HVT_LocustClone_0.Name: Psychic locustspawn
HVT_LocustClone_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a temporary manifestation and will soon disappear.

HVT_TTraitLovebug_0.Name: Psychic lovebug
HVT_TTraitLovebug_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} manifests a duplicate of {PAWN_objective}self. If it dies, {PAWN_pronoun} will recreate it after a delay, sped up by expending psyfocus or meditating. Artificial body parts cannot be removed from the duplicate.

HVT_LovebugDoppel_0.Name: Psychic doppelganger
HVT_LovebugDoppel_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is a doppelganger of another entity. If slain, {PAWN_pronoun} will disappear and later respawn from the original.

It is not possible to remove any artificial body parts {PAWN_pronoun} may have.

HVT_TTraitMagpie_0.Name: Psychic magpie
HVT_TTraitMagpie_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} manifests additional rewards when a quest is completed.

HVT_TTraitMayfly_0.Name: Psychic mayfly
HVT_TTraitMayfly_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is subject to a bizarre temporal distortion, which enables {PAWN_objective} to sleep and meditate faster. It also makes {PAWN_possessive} ability cooldowns recover three times as fast.

HVT_TTraitMeerkat_0.Name: Psychic meerkat
HVT_TTraitMeerkat_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has an incredibly powerful mind, and {PAWN_pronoun} emits a cerebral effect that stimulates learning and improves psychic sensitivity.

HVT_TTraitMite_0.Name: Psychic mite
HVT_TTraitMite_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} shrinks after spending enough time meditating. In this state, {PAWN_pronoun} is invisible to the naked eye and can move through ordinarily impassable obstacles. {PAWN_pronoun} returns to normal size on attacking or casting an ability.

HVT_TTraitMosquito_0.Name: Psychic mosquito
HVT_TTraitMosquito_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} removes blood from anyone affected by {PAWN_possessive} psycasts, restoring {PAWN_possessive} own body and hemogen based on the amount of blood removed. This effect cannot kill directly, as it will never bring a victim's blood loss above 50%.

Additionally, {PAWN_pronoun} cannot lose blood from open injuries.

HVT_TTraitMusang_0.Name: Psychic musang
HVT_TTraitMusang_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} gains psyfocus from the act of eating, and ingesting enough nutrition may produce a random serum.

HVT_TTraitMynah_0.Name: Psychic hill mynah
HVT_TTraitMynah_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} gains experience by psychically copying the skills of nearby higher-leveled individuals. {PAWN_pronoun} may also rarely learn psycasts from other psycasters by conversing with them.

HVT_TTraitNightingale_0.Name: Psychic nightingale
HVT_TTraitNightingale_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a better speaker and regains all but the last 10% of psyfocus spent on Word psycasts.

HVT_TTraitNoctule_0.Name: Psychic noctule
HVT_TTraitNoctule_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} becomes more physically and psychically powerful while in the dark, but wilts in the light. Becoming inspired or entering a mental break will always coincide with an eclipse.

HVT_TTraitNotothen_0.Name: Psychic notothen
HVT_TTraitNotothen_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} gains armor, vigor, and neural heat recovery rate as it gets colder.

HVT_TTraitOilbird_0.Name: Psychic oilbird
HVT_TTraitOilbird_0.Description: Whenever {PAWN_nameDef} psycasts, it creates a zone at the target's position in which {PAWN_possessive} cognition and psychic sensitivity are enhanced. Only one such zone may exist at any time.

HVT_TTraitOrbWeaver_0.Name: Psychic orb weaver
HVT_TTraitOrbWeaver_0.Description:
Whenever {PAWN_nameDef} psycasts, nearby plants grow faster, and nearby non-hostile buildings are repaired. The effect scales with {PAWN_possessive} psychic sensitivity.

Psycasting will also heal one random injury from a nearby random pawn; the heal's strength scales with the recipient's psychic sensitivity.

HVT_TTraitOrca_0.Name: Psychic orca
HVT_TTraitOrca_0.Description: While in water, {PAWN_nameDef} moves faster and is protected from damage. Blasts of water emit from the location of {PAWN_possessive} psycasts.

HVT_TTraitOsprey_0.Name: Psychic osprey
HVT_TTraitOsprey_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} exudes a protective presence, flatly reducing the damage nearby allies take and slowing their fatigue.

HVT_TTraitOxpecker_0.Name: Psychic oxpecker
HVT_TTraitOxpecker_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} intermittently psychically tames a random animal. This effect can occur over long distances, and its frequency is based on {PAWN_possessive} psychic sensitivity.

When {PAWN_pronoun} affects an animal with a psycast, its health is either boosted (if non-hostile) or impaired (if hostile).

This effect also alters fish reproductive behavior, causing them to breed more rapidly.

HVT_TTraitPeacock_0.Name: Psychic peacock
HVT_TTraitPeacock_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} exudes an aura which improves the vision of allies near {PAWN_objective} and makes everything it touches look gorgeous.

HVT_TTraitPelican_0.Name: Psychic pelican
HVT_TTraitPelican_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} can see, attack, and cast abilities from much further away.

HVT_TTraitPeregrine_0.Name: Psychic peregrine
HVT_TTraitPeregrine_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} nearly always stuns any foe {PAWN_pronoun} harms with an attack. The duration scales with the victim's psychic sensitivity.

HVT_TTraitPipistrelle_0.Name: Psychic pipistrelle
HVT_TTraitPipistrelle_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} receives detailed extrasensory impressions of {PAWN_possessive} surroundings. This new mode of perception increases dramatically in potency during meditation or psycasting.

HVT_TTraitPitohui_0.Name: Psychic pitohui
HVT_TTraitPitohui_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is immune to most forms of toxicity, which includes chemical overdoses, addictions, and dependencies; food poisoning; and, to a meager extent, disease. {PAWN_pronoun} can cure someone of any such afflictions (except for diseases) by affecting them with a psycast.

HVT_TTraitPolux_0.Name: Psychic polux
HVT_TTraitPolux_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is heavily resistant to disease and toxins. While meditating, {PAWN_pronoun} reshapes the surrounding terrain, drying, fertilizing, and unpolluting it.

HVT_TTraitPoorwill_0.Name: Psychic poorwill
HVT_TTraitPoorwill_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} can survive for long periods of time without air, food, water, rest, or fun, and {PAWN_pronoun} emits an effect that partially alleviates these needs in others as well.

HVT_TTraitPtarmigan_0.Name: Psychic ptarmigan
HVT_TTraitPtarmigan_0.Description: When {PAWN_nameDef} is happy, those near {PAWN_objective} gain a variety of benefits; when {PAWN_pronoun} is sad, nearby foes are demoralized and aggravated.

HVT_TTraitQuahog_0.Name: Psychic quahog
HVT_TTraitQuahog_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} constructively shapes inanimate material around {PAWN_objective}self. {PAWN_possessive} worn and wielded equipment is repaired over time. There is a small chance, while meditating, for part of {PAWN_possessive} gear to improve in quality, or for the spontaneous creation of a high-quality book or sculpture.

HVT_TTraitQuelea_0.Name: Psychic quelea
HVT_TTraitQuelea_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is surrounded by a field of selectively weakened gravity, allowing {PAWN_objective} and nearby allies to hover (allowing them to ignore terrain movement penalties), and preventing them from triggering traps.

This gravitic field also cancels out the destructive effects of a gravship lift-off. To do this, {PAWN_pronoun} must remain on the ground while the ship takes off.

HVT_TTraitQuokka_0.Name: Psychic quokka
HVT_TTraitQuokka_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} broadcasts a psychic serenity detectable by animals, improving {PAWN_possessive} interactions with them, preventing them from harming {PAWN_objective}, and even causing {PAWN_possessive} psycasts to cure affected animals' scaria.

HVT_TTraitRaven_0.Name: Psychic raven
HVT_TTraitRaven_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} sometimes receives extrasensory visions of distant places and the near future, which {PAWN_pronoun} leverages to reveal good events afterward.

HVT_TTraitRobin_0.Name: Psychic robin
HVT_TTraitRobin_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves faster and has an esoteric sense that randomly points {PAWN_objective} toward objects of interest in the wilderness. This sense is useful for finding treasure while traveling in a moving caravan.

HVT_TTraitRook_0.Name: Psychic rook
HVT_TTraitRook_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} derives more usable material from harvesting plants, butchering animals, and mining. Animals {PAWN_pronoun} extracts resources from regrow that material quicker, and when fishing {PAWN_pronoun} ends up with more fish than were actually caught.

HVT_TTraitScarab_0.Name: Psychic scarab
HVT_TTraitScarab_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is surrounded by a barrier which transforms incoming damage into neural heat. If {PAWN_pronoun} overloads {PAWN_possessive} neural heat limit, the barrier will vanish for a day, though it can be regenerated far faster via meditation.

HVT_TTraitScrubJay_0.Name: Psychic scrub jay
HVT_TTraitScrubJay_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a vast "extradimensional" storage achieved through the use of a personal skipgate system. When {PAWN_pronoun} meditates, random items may be added to this storage.

HVT_TTraitSeaIce_0.Name: Sea ice psychic
HVT_TTraitSeaIce_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is favored by the cold. {PAWN_pronoun} is all but immune to cold temperatures. While meditating, {PAWN_pronoun} saps heat from the environment. {PAWN_possessive} very presence chills {PAWN_possessive} foes; when {PAWN_pronoun} strikes, {PAWN_possessive} victims suffer from hypothermia.

HVT_TTraitShearwater_0.Name: Psychic shearwater
HVT_TTraitShearwater_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} can manipulate the weather. {PAWN_pronoun} also hovers, allowing {PAWN_objective} to ignore the pathing costs of terrain.

HVT_TTraitShrike_0.Name: Psychic shrike
HVT_TTraitShrike_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a chance to cause good events to occur on killing another person. {PAWN_pronoun} also gains psyfocus from killing other beings.

HVT_TTraitSpelopede_0.Name: Psychic spelopede
HVT_TTraitSpelopede_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} summons an insect hive every time {PAWN_pronoun} spends 20% psyfocus, and {PAWN_possessive} presence pacifies all but the largest insectoids. A pacified insectoid behaves like a wild animal, though it doesn't wander very far, and even if it was originally protecting a hive it will no longer take care of it.

HVT_TTraitStoat_0.Name: Psychic stoat
HVT_TTraitStoat_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a 75% chance to avoid damage. Even when {PAWN_pronoun} is struck, the blow glances.

HVT_TTraitStork_0.Name: Psychic stork
HVT_TTraitStork_0.Description: Every 1000% psyfocus {PAWN_nameDef} spends causes another entity to appear somewhere nearby. This new entity is allied with {PAWN_objective} and comes from a similar background.

HVT_TTraitStrix_0.Name: Psychic strix
HVT_TTraitStrix_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a chance to inflict madness upon foes {PAWN_pronoun} affects with psycasts. More psychically sensitive victims are more vulnerable, but psylink levels reduce susceptibility to the effect.

HVT_TTraitSwan_0.Name: Psychic swan
HVT_TTraitSwan_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is physically, mentally, and psychically empowered by being in a romantic relationship (or unconditionally, if aromantic). {PAWN_possessive} romantic partners and bonded animals receive a physical and mood buff too.

HVT_TTraitSwift_0.Name: Psychic swift
HVT_TTraitSwift_0.Description: While {PAWN_nameDef} has no neural heat, {PAWN_possessive} movement speed is vastly increased.

HVT_TTraitTanager_0.Name: Psychic tanager
HVT_TTraitTanager_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} gains various physical qualities based on {PAWN_possessive} artistic skill.

HVT_TTraitTermite_0.Name: Psychic termite
HVT_TTraitTermite_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} deals high damage to buildings and mines much faster. Additionally, enemy buildings near the locus of {PAWN_possessive} psycasts take high damage; higher-level psycasts result in a wider radius.

HVT_TTraitTern_0.Name: Psychic arctic tern
HVT_TTraitTern_0.Description: While on a caravan, {PAWN_nameDef} covers impossible distances in mere moments.

HVT_TTraitThrumbo_0.Name: Psychic thrumbo
HVT_TTraitThrumbo_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} augments {PAWN_possessive} melee attacks with skipgates that excise material from the victim, dealing bonus damage that ignores armor and most forms of damage resistance.

HVT_TTraitTMN_0.Name: Psychic touch-me-not
HVT_TTraitTMN_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} turns invisible, phases through obstacles, and moves faster for a short while after being hit (even if the hit did no damage).

HVT_TTraitToxbuzzard_0.Name: Psychic toxbuzzard
HVT_TTraitToxbuzzard_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} makes nearby foes more vulnerable to caustic or toxic agents. When harmed, {PAWN_pronoun} poisons nearby enemies, with a small chance to inflict acid burn.

HVT_TTraitUhu_0.Name: Psychic uhu
HVT_TTraitUhu_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} grows in size over time, making {PAWN_objective} more physically powerful. Spending psyfocus reverses this transformation to some extent.

HVT_TTraitVulture_0.Name: Psychic vulture
HVT_TTraitVulture_0.Description: Random corpses appear near {PAWN_nameDef} as {PAWN_pronoun} spends psyfocus.{PAWN_pronoun} also cannot be harmed by the living dead, such as ghouls or shamblers.

HVT_TTraitWarbler_0.Name: Psychic sedge warbler
HVT_TTraitWarbler_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} benefits from weaker versions of multiple inspirations at once. Those affected by {PAWN_possessive} psycasts may become inspired as well.

HVT_TTraitWQ_0.Name: Psychic war queen
HVT_TTraitWQ_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} periodically skips psychically tamed animals of a specific type to {PAWN_possessive} location. This effect occurs faster while meditating. New animals won't be summoned if doing so would cause the sum body size of all current ones to exceed twice {PAWN_possessive} psylink level.

This skipgate system also gradually helps replenish local populations of fish.

HVT_TTraitWeaverbird_0.Name: Psychic weaverbird
HVT_TTraitWeaverbird_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has supernatural craftsmanship. {PAWN_possessive} creations are a quality level higher and there is a 50% chance that any item with quality that {PAWN_pronoun} creates is duplicated.

HVT_TTraitWhalehead_0.Name: Psychic whalehead
HVT_TTraitWhalehead_0.Description: A walking portent of death, {PAWN_nameDef} terrifies foes in a vast radius, and those closer to {PAWN_objective} may even be struck by an uncontrollable urge to flee. {PAWN_pronoun} is also nearly immune to stress.

HVT_TTraitWoodpecker_0.Name: Psychic woodpecker
HVT_TTraitWoodpecker_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} can pass through solid obstacles while {PAWN_possessive} psyfocus is greater than 35%.

HVT_TTraitXerigium_0.Name: Psychic xerigium
HVT_TTraitXerigium_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is supernaturally gifted at healing. {PAWN_pronoun} heals anyone {PAWN_pronoun} tends to and always succeeds at surgery. {PAWN_pronoun} also somehow acquires herbal medicine after spending 10% psyfocus or meditating for long enough.

HVT_TTraitYellowjacket_0.Name: Psychic yellowjacket
HVT_TTraitYellowjacket_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} can focus to generate bolts of energy which spring towards a targeted foe.

HVT_TTraitDragon_0.Name: Psychic dragon
HVT_TTraitDragon_0.Description:
When another psycaster or latent psychic dies nearby, {PAWN_nameDef} partakes of their dissipating psychic thalergy and accumulates a 'hoard' of energy. This energy strengthens {PAWN_possessive} psycasting and health, while also shielding {PAWN_objective} from harm. However, the energy lessens whenever it prevents damage. More powerful psycasters grant more energy.

{PAWN_pronoun} also cannot be directly affected by {PAWN_possessive} enemies' psycasts.

HVT_TTraitEgregore_0.Name: Psychic egregore
HVT_TTraitEgregore_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is more thought than flesh. {PAWN_possessive} physical and mental attributes are greatly amplified by {PAWN_possessive} psychic sensitivity, and {PAWN_possessive} psychic potency is further boosted by the total psylink level of all nearby psycasters.

HVT_TTraitErinys_0.Name: Psychic erinys
HVT_TTraitErinys_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} can strip the psychic sensitivity from others. A second application of this ability kills the victim, extracting some of their psylinks. Awakened psychics cannot be killed by this ability.

HVT_TTraitHarpy_0.Name: Psychic harpy
HVT_TTraitHarpy_0.Description: Ordinary food does little for {PAWN_nameDef}, but eating a psycaster will fully sate {PAWN_objective} for a long while as well as possibly grant a psylink level. On eating the corpse of a fellow awakened or transcendent psychic, {PAWN_pronoun} will assimilate all of their awakenings and up to one of their transcendences.

HVT_TTraitLeviathan_0.Name: Psychic leviathan
HVT_TTraitLeviathan_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} gains increasing potency as a psycaster the longer {PAWN_pronoun} lives, develops a new awakening every six years, and gradually develops further transcendent powers over the course of {PAWN_possessive} lifetime.

HVT_TTraitPhoenix_0.Name: Psychic phoenix
HVT_TTraitPhoenix_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} can bring the dead back to life, though each beneficiary must spend at least 24 hours alive before this power can be used on them again. If {PAWN_pronoun} dies, {PAWN_pronoun} will automatically cast it on {PAWN_objective}self.

HVT_TTraitSeraph_0.Name: Psychic seraph
HVT_TTraitSeraph_0.Description: Allies near {PAWN_nameDef} are invulnerable to direct harm, but almost totally unable to deal direct damage. {PAWN_pronoun} experiences a less pronounced version of the effects, and can be harmed. On death, {PAWN_pronoun} will pass this ability on to another of the same faction.

HVT_TTraitSiren_0.Name: Psychic siren
HVT_TTraitSiren_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} can assert permanent mental control over others. The cooldown scales with the victim's market value.

HVT_TTraitSphinx_0.Name: Psychic sphinx
HVT_TTraitSphinx_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} can grant psylink levels to others. This power always succeeds on non-psycasters, but is likelier to fail the more psylink levels the target has. A target who fails three times dies.

HVT_TTraitThunderbird_0.Name: Psychic thunderbird
HVT_TTraitThunderbird_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} can start others on the path to psychic awakening, induce awakening in a latent psychic, or even grant a second awakening to another.

HVT_TTraitWraith_0.Name: Psychic wraith
HVT_TTraitWraith_0.Description: When {PAWN_nameDef} is slain, {PAWN_pronoun} will transfer {PAWN_possessive} consciousness into someone else, replacing their mind with {PAWN_possessive} own. For 24 hours afterward, {PAWN_pronoun} will be invulnerable to anything other than persona weapons, but will not be able to transfer to a new body.

HVT_TTraitZiz_0.Name: Psychic ziz
HVT_TTraitZiz_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} can call down destructive pillars of pulverizing force. {PAWN_pronoun} accumulates the energy to do so passively, but can speed this process up by meditating. {PAWN_pronoun} may also manifest an even more destructive effect, potent enough to obliterate cities, but this requires many days of meditation to charge.

HVT_Aestheticist_0.Name: Aestheticist
HVT_Aestheticist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is much more strongly affected by the beauty (or ugliness) of {PAWN_possessive} surroundings and fellow persons.

HVT_Agrizoophobe_0.Name: Agrizoophobe
HVT_Agrizoophobe_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} might be fine with tame animals, but few things are more terrifying to {PAWN_objective} than wild or insane animals. {PAWN_pronoun} is prone to uncontrollable panic if any are nearby.

HVT_Allegiant_0.Name: Allegiant
HVT_Allegiant_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is steadfastly loyal to {PAWN_possessive} faction. {PAWN_pronoun} tries harder to get along with {PAWN_possessive} compatriots and will never bail on them.

If imprisoned, {PAWN_pronoun} will be exceptionally uncooperative with {PAWN_possessive} captors.

HVT_Asocial_0.Name: Asocial
HVT_Asocial_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't care for conversation. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't chitchat with others, never engages in social recreation, and doesn't enjoy parties. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind it when others slight or insult {PAWN_objective} - it's just words, after all.

HVT_Bookworm_0.Name: Bookworm
HVT_Bookworm_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} could spend hours lost between the pages of a good book - {PAWN_pronoun} will feel happier after spending enough time reading. However, this preoccupation with reading has caused {PAWN_objective} to slightly neglect more physical pursuits.

HVT_Champion_0.Name: Champion
HVT_Champion_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is driven to great heights by thoughts of those dear to {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} works harder, learns faster, and becomes more resistant to pain and stress based on the total strength of {PAWN_possessive} positive relationships.

HVT_Conversationalist_0.Name: Conversationalist
HVT_Conversationalist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a master of small talk; speaking with others grants them a stacking mood bonus. If {PAWN_pronoun} goes on a mental break, it is likely to be an insulting spree.

HVT_Daydreamer_0.Name: Daydreamer
HVT_Daydreamer_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has an overactive imagination. At random, or if {PAWN_pronoun} becomes too stressed, {PAWN_pronoun} will retreat into {PAWN_possessive} imagination, resulting in a harmless mental break. After indulging {PAWN_possessive} imagination in such a way, {PAWN_pronoun} becomes inspired.

HVT_Drudge_0.Name: Drudge
HVT_Drudge_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is exceptionally skilled at basic tasks, but struggles with advanced concepts. Except for shooting, melee, and social, {PAWN_possessive} skills degrade rapidly while above level 10.

HVT_Forgettable_0.Name: Forgettable
HVT_Forgettable_0.Description: With {PAWN_possessive} bland demeanor and generic appearance, it can be easy to forget {PAWN_nameDef} is around. Others opinions of {PAWN_objective} (both positive and negative) are only two-thirds as strong as normal.

HVT_Graver_0.Name: Graver
HVT_Graver_0.Description: Looking at corpses makes {PAWN_nameDef} happy, and {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind wearing tainted apparel.

HVT_Hale_0.Name: Hale
HVT_Hale_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is filled with vigor. {PAWN_pronoun} is difficult to harm, and is quick to bounce back from exhaustion, injury, and illness.

HVT_Hedonist_0.Name: Hedonist
HVT_Hedonist_0.Description: Fun is everything to {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} never gets bored of any kind of recreation, but {PAWN_pronoun} needs it more frequently than others.

HVT_Hysteric_0.Name: Hysteric
HVT_Hysteric_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} goes into exaggerated histrionics when below {PAWN_possessive} mental break threshold, stressing out anyone who can see or hear {PAWN_objective}.

HVT_Judgemental_0.Name: Judgemental
HVT_Judgemental_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is quick to assume the worst of other people. {PAWN_possessive} opinions of others are much more strongly influenced by negative impressions than positive ones.

HVT_Lech_0.Name: Lech
HVT_Lech_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} really likes anyone {PAWN_pronoun} could be even a little attracted to. Sadly, the way in which {PAWN_pronoun} exhibits this is gross and creepy, so they tend not to like {PAWN_objective} back.

HVT_Lovesick_0.Name: Lovesick
HVT_Lovesick_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} needs someone to love with all {PAWN_possessive} being. {PAWN_possessive} mood soars immensely when {PAWN_pronoun} has a lover, but {PAWN_pronoun} is much more sensitive to romantic hurt, and those who spurn {PAWN_objective} also suffer.

HVT_Mariner_0.Name: Mariner
HVT_Mariner_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves being in the water. {PAWN_pronoun} enjoys getting wet, and swims quite quickly.

HVT_MetabolicFreak_0.Name: Metabolic freak
HVT_MetabolicFreak_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has an inexplicably robust metabolism. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't need to eat as often and never gets food poisoning. So long as the food isn't raw, {PAWN_pronoun} also doesn't care what it is.

HVT_Outdoorsy_0.Name: Outdoorsy
HVT_Outdoorsy_0.Description: Roughing it out in the wilderness doesn't bother {PAWN_nameDef}, but {PAWN_pronoun} despises being locked indoors.

HVT_PeoplePleaser_0.Name: People pleaser
HVT_PeoplePleaser_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} craves the approval of those {PAWN_pronoun} knows. {PAWN_pronoun} is happy when others like {PAWN_objective}, and sad when they don't.

HVT_RepressedRage_0.Name: Repressed rage
HVT_RepressedRage_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} harbors an extremely dangerous dark side which comes out when {PAWN_pronoun} starts to lose control. While stressed or in a mental break, {PAWN_pronoun} becomes much faster, stronger, and harder to subdue; during such an episode, any damage {PAWN_pronoun} takes may cause {PAWN_objective} to go berserk.

HVT_Reveller_0.Name: Reveller
HVT_Reveller_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is all about the party life! {PAWN_pronoun} throws a party whenever {PAWN_pronoun} becomes inspired, and {PAWN_pronoun} loves attending any sort of social function.

HVT_Sadist_0.Name: Sadistic
HVT_Sadist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} gains mood and has a chance to become inspired when other people mentally break or socially fight. However, this tends not to endear {PAWN_objective} to those people.

HVT_Skulker_0.Name: Skulker
HVT_Skulker_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is quite adept at evading detection. {PAWN_pronoun} doesnt leave tracks and is difficult to spot. {PAWN_pronoun} even helps mask the passage of caravans {PAWN_pronoun} is part of.

HVT_Sniper_0.Name: Sniper
HVT_Sniper_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} can pick out targets at further distances than anyone else. However, {PAWN_pronoun} is less talented at close-quarters combat, and {PAWN_pronoun} feels unsafe without a ranged weapon.

HVT_Staid_0.Name: Staid
HVT_Staid_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} lacks some sort of ineffable inner spark. {PAWN_pronoun} won't recreate, doesn't care for beauty, and can't become inspired.

HVT_Sunbather_0.Name: Sunbather
HVT_Sunbather_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} luxuriates in the sunlight, and loves soaking up its rays. Being in direct sunlight makes {PAWN_objective} happier but also makes {PAWN_objective} work slower.

HVT_Tempestophile_0.Name: Tempestophile
HVT_Tempestophile_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves turbulent weather. {PAWN_pronoun} receives a slight mood boost when the weather acts up, and exotic conditions like eclipses, auroras, or even toxic fallout bring {PAWN_objective} great joy.

HVT_Textile_0.Name: Textile
HVT_Textile_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} places great importance on the wearing of garments. {PAWN_pronoun} dislikes being naked, and thinks poorly of others for not covering up at all times. {PAWN_pronoun} also can't stand wearing tattered apparel, so {PAWN_pronoun} takes good care of what {PAWN_pronoun} wears.

HVT_Tranquil_0.Name: Tranquil
HVT_Tranquil_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is utterly at peace. {PAWN_pronoun} will not participate in violence, and can't mentally break. Ever.

HVT_Tranquil0_0.Name: Tranquil
HVT_Tranquil0_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is utterly at peace. {PAWN_pronoun} will not participate in violence, and can't mentally break. Ever.



For technical reasons, this trait does not actually disable violence until the game starts.

HVT_Vagabond_0.Name: Vagabond
HVT_Vagabond_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} doesnt feel the need to be in a community. If things get too bad, or if {PAWN_pronoun} experiences a random surge of wanderlust, {PAWN_pronoun} will leave.

If imprisoned, {PAWN_pronoun} will be uncooperative with {PAWN_possessive} captors.

HVT_Vain_0.Name: Vain
HVT_Vain_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is obsessed with {PAWN_possessive} own appearance. {PAWN_possessive} beauty and the quality of {PAWN_possessive} apparel impact {PAWN_possessive} mood.

HVT_Vicious_0.Name: Vicious
HVT_Vicious_0.Description: Violent intent builds up within {PAWN_nameDef}, causing {PAWN_possessive} mood to worsen until {PAWN_pronoun} unleashes it in a savage, lethal burst.

HVT_Visionary_0.Name: Visionary
HVT_Visionary_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} occasionally has episodes of profound insight during which {PAWN_pronoun} will create a schematic for a new technology. This happens more frequently when {PAWN_pronoun} is happier.

HVT_WeaponArtist_0.Name: Weapon artist
HVT_WeaponArtist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} intuitively leans into the strengths of any weapon {PAWN_pronoun} wields, gaining different bonuses depending on the currently wielded weapons nature.

HVT_Winsome_0.Name: Winsome
HVT_Winsome_0.Description: There's just something really likeable about {PAWN_nameDef}.

HVT_Prideful_1.Name: Entitled
HVT_Prideful_1.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has high expectations at minimum. When they are met, {PAWN_pronoun} loses motivation, so {PAWN_pronoun} works and learns slower.

HVT_Prideful_2.Name: Prideful
HVT_Prideful_2.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has high expectations at minimum. When they are met, {PAWN_pronoun} becomes motivated, so {PAWN_pronoun} works and learns faster.

HVT_Humble_0.Name: Humble
HVT_Humble_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} keeps {PAWN_possessive} expectations low, no matter how pampered {PAWN_pronoun} gets. Even if {PAWN_pronoun} gains a position of authority, {PAWN_possessive} expectations still won't progress past the moderate level.

HVT_Imperceptive_0.Name: Imperceptive
HVT_Imperceptive_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} pays less attention to {PAWN_possessive} senses than most. Though this is mostly disadvantageous, {PAWN_pronoun} can sleep soundly through anything, as well as weather more trying temperatures.

HVT_Perceptive_1.Name: Keen senses
HVT_Perceptive_1.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has very sharp senses. Though this is mostly a boon, it also makes {PAWN_objective} more sensitive to comfort, discomfort and extreme temperatures.

HVT_Perceptive_2.Name: Powerful senses
HVT_Perceptive_2.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has senses almost on par with bionic augmentation. Though this is mostly a boon, it also makes {PAWN_objective} more sensitive to comfort, discomfort and extreme temperatures.

HVT_Strong_1.Name: Mighty
HVT_Strong_1.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} hones {PAWN_possessive} body to a state of notable physical fitness, allowing {PAWN_objective} to carry more and hit harder.

HVT_Strong_2.Name: Herculean
HVT_Strong_2.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is immensely, ridiculously strong, allowing {PAWN_objective} to carry far more and hit far harder.

HVT_Faithful_-2.Name: Overly credulous
HVT_Faithful_-2.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is so gullible it beggars belief. {PAWN_pronoun} is very strongly affected by {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion, yet is also very susceptible to conversion attempts.

HVT_Faithful_-1.Name: Credulous
HVT_Faithful_-1.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes almost anything anyone tells {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} is strongly affected by {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion, yet is also susceptible to conversion attempts.

HVT_Faithful_1.Name: Adherent
HVT_Faithful_1.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has nearly unshakable faith in {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion. {PAWN_pronoun} is strongly affected by {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion, and is very resistant to conversion attempts.

HVT_Faithful_2.Name: Unquestioning adherent
HVT_Faithful_2.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} spends every breath in service of {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion. {PAWN_pronoun} is very strongly affected by {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion, and is immune to conversion attempts.

HVT_Doubtful_0.Name: Doubtful
HVT_Doubtful_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is chronically uncertain about everything; {PAWN_pronoun} is less affected by {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion.

HVT_Intolerant_0.Name: Intolerant
HVT_Intolerant_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} dislikes and distrusts anyone who doesn't believe the things {PAWN_pronoun} does. Conversion attempts upset {PAWN_objective}, and changing to a new ideo frightens {PAWN_objective} terribly.

HVT_Tolerant_0.Name: Tolerant
HVT_Tolerant_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} tolerates those who dont follow {PAWN_possessive} beliefs. {PAWN_pronoun} isn't quite so upset with non-believers who violate {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion's taboos, and {PAWN_pronoun} isnt upset by botched conversion attempts.

HVT_Subjugator_0.Name: Subjugator
HVT_Subjugator_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesnt just want to be above others - {PAWN_pronoun} needs others to be far beneath {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} can be satisfied by holding a position of authority or by the presence of enough slaves.

HVT_Liberator_0.Name: Liberator
HVT_Liberator_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} believes freedom is a right everyone should enjoy. {PAWN_pronoun} disapproves of slavery, and, to a lesser extent, imprisonment of anyone {PAWN_pronoun} knows.

If imprisoned, {PAWN_pronoun} will be uncooperative with {PAWN_possessive} captors.

HVT_Conformist_0.Name: Conformist
HVT_Conformist_0.Description: For {PAWN_nameDef}, maintaining ideoligious solidarity is more important than embracing the truth. {PAWN_pronoun} will never be in the ideoligious minority for longer than two days; {PAWN_pronoun} then converts to whatever the most people in the faction {PAWN_pronoun} belongs to (or is enslaved by) believes.

HVT_Guru_0.Name: Guru
HVT_Guru_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} projects a sense of wisdom, allowing {PAWN_objective} to use the abilities of a moral guide. If {PAWN_pronoun} actually has the moral guide role, {PAWN_pronoun} will have two copies of the ability set, on separate cooldowns.

HVT_PersecutionComplex_0.Name: Persecution complex
HVT_PersecutionComplex_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} feels restless and unhappy when {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion is in the majority. Conversely, {PAWN_pronoun} works harder and is more determined when in the minority.

HVT_Proclaimer_0.Name: Proclaimer
HVT_Proclaimer_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is very eager to convert others to {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion.

HVT_RadicalThinker_0.Name: Radical thinker
HVT_RadicalThinker_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} constantly questions the nature and purpose of reality, personhood, and other profound topics. As a result, {PAWN_pronoun} may randomly come up with a new ideoligion, which {PAWN_pronoun} will be very passionate about spreading.

HVT_Superstitious_0.Name: Superstitious
HVT_Superstitious_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes in a wide variety of superstitions. As {PAWN_pronoun} randomly comes across what {PAWN_pronoun} believes to be omens, {PAWN_possessive} mood will fluctuate.

HVT_Misopedist_0.Name: Misopedist
HVT_Misopedist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} really dislikes and distrusts children and pregnant people.

HVT_Caretaker_0.Name: Caretaker
HVT_Caretaker_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes that children are the most important thing in the universe. {PAWN_pronoun} enjoys taking care of them; living in a place without kids makes {PAWN_objective} feel empty.

HVT_Mechaphile_0.Name: Mechaphile
HVT_Mechaphile_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} likes having mechanoids around. {PAWN_pronoun} will be saddened if an allied mechanoid dies.

HVT_Mechaphobe_0.Name: Mechaphobe
HVT_Mechaphobe_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} hates mechanoids, and {PAWN_pronoun} dislikes and distrusts those who control them. This antipathy is so strong that {PAWN_pronoun} can project it to discombobulate mechanoids, provided {PAWN_pronoun} has the means to broadcast on their bandwidth.

HVT_Environmentalist_0.Name: Environmentalist
HVT_Environmentalist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} thinks the beauty and health of the land should be preserved. {PAWN_pronoun} despises pollution, and appreciates being anywhere without its taint.

HVT_Mentor_0.Name: Mentor
HVT_Mentor_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} takes any opportunity {PAWN_pronoun} can to arm others with knowledge. Whenever {PAWN_pronoun} socially interacts with someone, they gain experience in a random skill both parties can use.

HVT_GenePurist_0.Name: Xenotypist
HVT_GenePurist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} really dislikes and distrusts those of different xenotypes. {PAWN_pronoun} may not mind variation in the genetics of {PAWN_possessive} own kind, but even xenotypes very similar to {PAWN_possessive} own are disgusting in {PAWN_possessive} eyes.

HVT_Catastrophist_0.Name: Catastrophist
HVT_Catastrophist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is fascinated with the idea of the world ending. Climate calamities, incoming planetkillers, and rising anomalous activity will all improve {PAWN_possessive} mood.

HVT_Corruptible_0.Name: Corruptible
HVT_Corruptible_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is linked to a dark influence. The further it influences reality, the more sensitive {PAWN_pronoun} becomes to the supernatural... but it also takes a toll on {PAWN_possessive} sanity.

HVT_Haunted_0.Name: Haunted
HVT_Haunted_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is inextricably connected to a lurking, invisible presence. Day and night, it attempts to psychically torment {PAWN_objective}, and it will even infrequently attack {PAWN_objective} in the physical world.

HVT_MonsterHunter_0.Name: Monster hunter
HVT_MonsterHunter_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} knows that the best eldritch horror is a thoroughly destroyed one. {PAWN_pronoun} is happy to kill them, and will be content if void activity is minimal. However, {PAWN_pronoun} may also sometimes randomly slaughter captured ones.

HVT_MonsterLover_0.Name: Monster lover
HVT_MonsterLover_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} appreciates the strange forms of nonhuman entities. {PAWN_pronoun} will be agitated if void activity is minimal. Motivated by a strange sense of compassion, {PAWN_pronoun} may randomly decide to free captive entities.

HVT_Twisted_0.Name: Twisted
HVT_Twisted_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} cares less about others and is prone to saying macabre, disturbing things when stressed to the breaking point. {PAWN_pronoun} is unperturbed by monsters and corpses, and has no issue with using either for sustenance or apparel. Ultimately, {PAWN_pronoun} feels restrained by {PAWN_possessive} humanity - and if {PAWN_pronoun} has an extreme mental break, {PAWN_pronoun} might just free {PAWN_objective}self from it.

HVT_Earthborne_0.Name: Earthborne
HVT_Earthborne_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} hates aerial travel of any kind, and doesn't like being in space. These things make {PAWN_objective} nauseous.

HVT_Skybound_0.Name: Skybound
HVT_Skybound_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} yearns for the open sky and the feeling of the wind. {PAWN_pronoun} enjoys aerial travel of any kind, and {PAWN_pronoun} likes the sensation of being in high orbit.

HVT_Angler_0.Name: Angler
HVT_Angler_0.Description:
Fishing makes {PAWN_nameDef} happy, and {PAWN_possessive} skill at fishing makes {PAWN_objective} half as prone to fumble a catch or get hurt by a fish. However, {PAWN_pronoun} will be sad if there are no fish nearby.

If {PAWN_pronoun} is a psycaster, {PAWN_pronoun} will find fishing sufficiently meditative to gain 3% psyfocus per fishing attempt.

HVT_CelestialCelerity_0.Name: Celestial celerity
HVT_CelestialCelerity_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves in a strange way. {PAWN_pronoun} is a little awkward in surface gravity, but becomes more graceful out in space.

HVT_Globetrotter_0.Name: Globetrotter
HVT_Globetrotter_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} wants to witness all the wonders of the world. {PAWN_pronoun} gains a permanent mood bonus per unique biome or landmark feature visited.

HVT_Navigator_0.Name: Navigator
HVT_Navigator_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has an impressive sense of direction, as well as great situational awareness. {PAWN_pronoun} rarely gets lost, surprised by traps, or otherwise inconvenienced by difficulties during travel.

HVT_Scavenger_0.Name: Treasure seeker
HVT_Scavenger_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is always on the lookout for precious baubles.

Among other things, {PAWN_pronoun} fishes in an unorthodox manner that grants {PAWN_objective} a higher chance to find rare items instead of fish.

HVT_Test_0.Name: Game developer
HVT_Test_0.Description:
Buy Tynan's book. Otherwise, you'll find out that {PAWN_possessive} melee dps and armor penetration are over NINE THOUSAND!!1!

({PAWN_nameDef} isn't actually any better at doing damage).

RT_Nearsighted_0.Name: Nearsighted
RT_Nearsighted_0.Description: [PAWN_name] finds it difficult to focus on distant targets, and prefer to get up close and personal.

RT_Farsighted_0.Name: Farsighted
RT_Farsighted_0.Description: [PAWN_name] could spot a target from nearly a hundred meters, yet still somehow walk into walls.

RT_Stiff_0.Name: Stiff
RT_Stiff_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is so rigid, it's almost like [PAWN_pronoun] is souless.

RT_PoorHygiene_0.Name: Poor hygiene
RT_PoorHygiene_0.Description: [PAWN_name] doesn't care about [PAWN_possessive] hygiene, and sometimes get sick from bad food.

RT_Unconvincing_0.Name: Unconvincing
RT_Unconvincing_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has never won a debate in [PAWN_possessive] life.

RT_Resilient_0.Name: Resilient
RT_Resilient_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has been in plenty of fights since [PAWN_pronoun] was a kid, and had built up a tolerance to injury and pain as a result.

RT_Fragile_0.Name: Fragile
RT_Fragile_0.Description: [PAWN_name] lived a pampered life until now, and is unused to the brutal challenges present out in the Rim.

RT_Energetic_0.Name: Energetic
RT_Energetic_0.Description: [PAWN_name] always tackle his tasks with great enthusism.

RT_Restless_0.Name: Restless
RT_Restless_0.Description: [PAWN_name] often has a difficult time falling asleep.

RT_Efficient_0.Name: Efficient
RT_Efficient_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is quite productive when it comes to work.

RT_Inefficient_0.Name: Inefficient
RT_Inefficient_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is somewhat of a bottleneck in the colony.

RT_Valiant_0.Name: Valiant
RT_Valiant_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is brave, [PAWN_pronoun] would stand [PAWN_possessive] ground where others would scramble and run.

RT_Craven_0.Name: Craven
RT_Craven_0.Description: When there's a fight, [PAWN_name] is the first to run.

RT_Rowdy_0.Name: Rowdy
RT_Rowdy_0.Description: [PAWN_name] likes a good fight, [PAWN_pronoun] will sometimes start a fight just because [PAWN_pronoun] can.

RT_HeatTolerant_0.Name: Heat tolerant
RT_HeatTolerant_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is more comfortable being in hot environment than his peers.

RT_HeatIntolerant_0.Name: Heat intolerant
RT_HeatIntolerant_0.Description: [PAWN_name] does not like being in the heat.

RT_ColdTolerant_0.Name: Cold tolerant
RT_ColdTolerant_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is more comfortable being in cold environment than his peers.

RT_ColdIntolerant_0.Name: Cold intolerant
RT_ColdIntolerant_0.Description: [PAWN_name] does not like being in the cold.

RT_Muscular_0.Name: Muscular
RT_Muscular_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has a well built body, people around [PAWN_pronoun] find that rather attractive.

RT_Frail_0.Name: Frail
RT_Frail_0.Description: [PAWN_name] looks a bit fragile, but not in a lovable way.

RT_Ravenous_0.Name: Ravenous
RT_Ravenous_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has a bottomless pit for a stomach.

RT_Gifted_0.Name: Gifted
RT_Gifted_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is naturally talented, [PAWN_pronoun] gets a headstart before everyone else.

RT_Incompetent_0.Name: Incompetent
RT_Incompetent_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is someone everyone loves to hate.

RT_PatientCook_0.Name: Patient cook
RT_PatientCook_0.Description: [PAWN_name] takes great care in the preparation of food, [PAWN_pronoun] never skip a step just to have an early meal.

RT_ImpatientCook_0.Name: Impatient cook
RT_ImpatientCook_0.Description: [PAWN_name] couldn't care less about following the recipes as long as [PAWN_pronoun] can get food into [PAWN_possessive] mouth in record time.

RT_Healthy_0.Name: Healthy
RT_Healthy_0.Description: [PAWN_name] lives a healthy lifestyle, and wakes up feeling energetic and cheerful.

RT_ChronicallyIll_0.Name: Chronically ill
RT_ChronicallyIll_0.Description: [PAWN_name] gets ill quite often, and seem to require more effort to get out of bed than the average person.

RT_TemperatureIntolerant_0.Name: Temperature intolerant
RT_TemperatureIntolerant_0.Description: [PAWN_name] thinks that summer is way too hot, and winter is way too cold.

RT_Coordinated_0.Name: Coordinated
RT_Coordinated_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has good reaction time and finds physical activities less stressful than [PAWN_possessive] peers.

RT_Clumsy_0.Name: Clumsy
RT_Clumsy_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is easily distracted and often mess up when it comes to physical activities.

RT_Hardy_0.Name: Hardy
RT_Hardy_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is what people refer to as a 'stronk boi'.

RT_Feeble_0.Name: Feeble
RT_Feeble_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is so fragile, it doesn't take much to take [PAWN_objective] out of action.

RT_EasilyAmused_0.Name: Easily amused
RT_EasilyAmused_0.Description: Whether by sheer optimism or a force of personality, [PAWN_name] always manages to see the bright side of life.

RT_ConstantlyBemused_0.Name: Constantly bemused
RT_ConstantlyBemused_0.Description: Life to [PAWN_name] is an endless, boring joke that [PAWN_pronoun] just can't get away from.

RT_Inquisitive_0.Name: Inquisitive
