RT_Inquisitive_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has an interest in understanding the workings of the world, and is able to apply [PAWN_possessive] knowledge in daily life.

RT_Ignorant_0.Name: Ignorant
RT_Ignorant_0.Description: Gaps in [PAWN_name]'s education and general lack of curiosity makes life often stressful for [PAWN_objective].

RT_Tidy_0.Name: Tidy
RT_Tidy_0.Description: [PAWN_name] likes to keep [PAWN_possessive] surroundings clean, and is used to being in an organised environment.

RT_Messy_0.Name: Messy
RT_Messy_0.Description: [PAWN_name] often neglect their surroundings, making it difficult for [PAWN_objective] to get work done.

RCT_Aesthete_0.Name: Aesthete
RCT_Aesthete_0.Description: [PAWN_name] loves beautiful things, and really cares about how [PAWN_possessive] enviroment looks.

RCT_AnimalLover_0.Name: Animal lover
RCT_AnimalLover_0.Description: [PAWN_name] loves animals. [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't feel quite the same about people, though.

RCT_AnimalHater_0.Name: Animal hater
RCT_AnimalHater_0.Description: [PAWN_name] just isn't an "animal person." [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't like animals, and for the record, they don't seem to much like [PAWN_objective], either.

RCT_Builder_0.Name: Builder
RCT_Builder_0.Description: [PAWN_name] loved playing with construction toys as a child, and still enjoys the thrill of "putting things together." But [PAWN_pronoun] tends to be a bit lost without clear instructions to follow.

RCT_Butcher_0.Name: Butcher
RCT_Butcher_0.Description: [PAWN_name] enjoys preparing meat for cooking. [PAWN_possessive] butchering speed is greatly increased, but only if [PAWN_pronoun]'s dealing with animal corpses. [PAWN_pronoun]'s terrible with mechanoids.

RCT_Claustrophobic_0.Name: Claustrophobic
RCT_Claustrophobic_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is claustrophobic. [PAWN_pronoun] is terrified of tight spaces, and thus is not a very competent miner.

RCT_ColdLover_0.Name: Cold lover
RCT_ColdLover_0.Description: [PAWN_name] loves colder temperatures. [PAWN_pronoun]'ll complain less than others when it's chilly, but will whine more when it's hot.

RCT_Dunce_0.Name: Dunce
RCT_Dunce_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a bit of a dunce, and learns at a slower rate than others.

RCT_Gourmet_0.Name: Gourmet
RCT_Gourmet_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has a passion for food preparation. [PAWN_possessive] culinary creations are quite tasty, but [PAWN_pronoun] tends to take a while getting them "just right."

RCT_HeatLover_0.Name: Heat lover
RCT_HeatLover_0.Description: [PAWN_name] loves the heat. [PAWN_pronoun]'ll complain less than others when it's hot, but will whine more when it's cold.

RCT_Aptitude_-1.Name: Inept
RCT_Aptitude_-1.Description: [PAWN_pronoun] means well, but [PAWN_name] is uncoordinated, and just not very good at any sort of skilled labor.

RCT_Aptitude_1.Name: Coordinated
RCT_Aptitude_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is unusually coordinated, and good at most any sort of skilled labor.

RCT_PainThreshold_2.Name: Unstoppable
RCT_PainThreshold_2.Description: [PAWN_name] has an exceptionally high tolerance for pain. [PAWN_pronoun] is unlikely to be immobilized by it.

RCT_PainThreshold_1.Name: Ironman
RCT_PainThreshold_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has a high tolerance for pain.

RCT_PainThreshold_-1.Name: Low pain tolerance
RCT_PainThreshold_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] will become immobilized by pain more quickly than most.

RCT_Inventor_0.Name: Inventor
RCT_Inventor_0.Description: Strange new ideas just appear in [PAWN_name]'s mind. Researching new technologies comes easily to [PAWN_objective], but [PAWN_pronoun] always seems distracted.

RCT_Eyesight_-1.Name: Cranial nerve palsy
RCT_Eyesight_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] has a hard time seeing things clearly unless they are right in front of them.

RCT_Eyesight_1.Name: Eagle-eyed
RCT_Eyesight_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has a keen eye, and can quickly spot targets.

RCT_EatingSpeed_-1.Name: Nibbler
RCT_EatingSpeed_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] picks at [PAWN_possessive] food, taking extra time to finish [PAWN_possessive] meals.

RCT_EatingSpeed_1.Name: Glutton
RCT_EatingSpeed_1.Description: [PAWN_name] devours [PAWN_possessive] meals much faster than others.

RCT_Nyctophobe_-1.Name: Nyctophobe
RCT_Nyctophobe_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] is really afraid of the dark.

RCT_Nyctophobe_1.Name: Nyctophile
RCT_Nyctophobe_1.Description: [PAWN_name] doesn't fear the dark at all.

RCT_Perfectionist_0.Name: Perfectionist
RCT_Perfectionist_0.Description: [PAWN_name] refuses to accept less than [PAWN_possessive] best in any endeavor, no matter how long it takes. [PAWN_pronoun]'s less likely to fail when doing something, but [PAWN_pronoun] works slowly.

RCT_Medic_-1.Name: Poor medic
RCT_Medic_-1.Description: Even when they have the best of intentions, some people just aren't cut out for medicine. [PAWN_name] is one of those people.

RCT_Medic_1.Name: Skilled medic
RCT_Medic_1.Description: [PAWN_name] seems to have a knack for medical work. Patients in [PAWN_possessive] care will likely fare well.

RCT_Medic_2.Name: Master medic
RCT_Medic_2.Description: [PAWN_name] has a natural aptitude for medical work. Between [PAWN_possessive] steady, skilled hands and [PAWN_possessive] inspiring bedside manner, patients in [PAWN_possessive] care will have little to fear.

RCT_Rockhound_0.Name: Rockhound
RCT_Rockhound_0.Description: [PAWN_name] enjoys working with rocks. [PAWN_possessive] mining speed is increased, but [PAWN_possessive] lack of interest in other areas slows [PAWN_objective] down when doing other jobs. And [PAWN_pronoun] hates working with plants.

RCT_Savant_0.Name: Savant
RCT_Savant_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a modern-day Da Vinci, with a creative mind that can grasp new ideas almost effortlessly. But [PAWN_pronoun]'s almost painfully slow when it comes to doing actual physical work.

RCT_decentlearner_0.Name: Decent learner
RCT_decentlearner_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has always picked up skills pretty quickly.

RCT_Trader_-1.Name: Sucker
RCT_Trader_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] just can't seem to help but get taken advantage of while trading. [PAWN_pronoun]'ll pay more than [PAWN_pronoun] should, and still think that [PAWN_pronoun] got a good deal.

RCT_Trader_1.Name: Haggler
RCT_Trader_1.Description: [PAWN_name] likes to haggle, and isn't bad at it. [PAWN_pronoun] tends to get better prices than most people.

ShootingAccuracy_1.Name: Careful shooter
ShootingAccuracy_1.Description: [PAWN_name] takes more time to aim when shooting. [PAWN_pronoun] shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.

ShootingAccuracy_-1.Name: Trigger-happy
ShootingAccuracy_-1.Description: Pew! Pew! Pew! [PAWN_name] just likes pulling the trigger. [PAWN_pronoun] shoots faster than others, but less accurately.

ShootingAccuracy_2.Name: Deadshot
ShootingAccuracy_2.Description: [PAWN_name] knows how to handle a firearm, and can shoot both quickly and accurately.

RCT_Diplomat_-1.Name: Uncouth
RCT_Diplomat_-1.Description: Subtlety? Diplomacy? [PAWN_name] barely even understands the meaning of the words.

RCT_Diplomat_1.Name: Diplomat
RCT_Diplomat_1.Description: [PAWN_name] knows how to grease the wheels of diplomacy.

RCT_Diplomat_2.Name: Master diplomat
RCT_Diplomat_2.Description: [PAWN_name] has such a way with words that [PAWN_pronoun] always manages to cool down a tense situation. [PAWN_pronoun] could talk for days and people would still listen.

RCT_Constitution_-1.Name: Weak constitution
RCT_Constitution_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] is especially vulnerable to diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.

RCT_Constitution_1.Name: Strong constitution
RCT_Constitution_1.Description: [PAWN_name]'s body is stronger than normal against diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.

RCT_BrownThumb_0.Name: Brown thumb
RCT_BrownThumb_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a terrible gardener. The only thing [PAWN_pronoun] seems able to grow is weeds.

RCT_GreenThumb_0.Name: Green thumb
RCT_GreenThumb_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a great gardener. The only thing [PAWN_pronoun] wants is a greener world.

VTE_AbsentMinded_0.Name: Absent-minded
VTE_AbsentMinded_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} tends to let {PAWN_possessive} mind drift, even in the middle of work. {PAWN_pronoun} may sometimes stop tasks at random.

VTE_Eccentric_0.Name: Eccentric
VTE_Eccentric_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a screw loose, but it comes with a sharper scientific mind.

VTE_Perfectionist_0.Name: Perfectionist
VTE_Perfectionist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} strives for perfection in {PAWN_possessive} work. {PAWN_pronoun} produces higher-quality products, but works more slowly. Failing to meet {PAWN_possessive} standards causes unhappiness, and on rare occasions {PAWN_pronoun} may abandon a project mid-way.

VTE_Coward_0.Name: Coward
VTE_Coward_0.Description:
While fully capable of warfare in theory, [PAWN_name]'s fight or flight instincts heavily lean towards flight, and [PAWN_pronoun] will try to hide or run as a first priority.

If imprisoned, [PAWN_pronoun] will be quite cooperative with [PAWN_possessive] captors.

VTE_Brave_0.Name: Brave
VTE_Brave_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a higher mental and physical fortitude compared to most and can more readily adapt to harsh environments in the rimworlds.

If imprisoned, [PAWN_pronoun] will be uncooperative with [PAWN_possessive] captors.

VTE_Clumsy_0.Name: Clumsy
VTE_Clumsy_0.Description: Minor bruises and scrapes plague {PAWN_nameDef}, usually from tripping or falling due to poor coordination.

VTE_HeatInclined_0.Name: Heat inclined
VTE_HeatInclined_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the heat of a dry summer day. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind working up a sweat or sleeping in warmth.

VTE_ColdInclined_0.Name: Cold inclined
VTE_ColdInclined_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the chill of a brisk winter night. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind shivering or sleeping in the cold.

VTE_HeavySleeper_0.Name: Heavy sleeper
VTE_HeavySleeper_0.Description: A bomb could go off beside {PAWN_nameDef} while {PAWN_pronoun} sleeps, and {PAWN_pronoun} would keep right on sleeping. {PAWN_pronoun} can't be bothered to work or defend the colony mid-nap.

VTE_Neat_0.Name: Neat
VTE_Neat_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is naturally hygienic and organized. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't track dirt or scatter trash, and enjoys cleaning.

VTE_Slob_0.Name: Slob
VTE_Slob_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is naturally sloppy, leaving trash and dirt scattered around. At least {PAWN_pronoun} isn't much bothered by messy surroundings.

VTE_Workaholic_0.Name: Workaholic
VTE_Workaholic_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} struggles to take breaks or rest mid-job. {PAWN_pronoun} will keep working, even at the expense of {PAWN_possessive} health or sleep.

VTE_IronStomach_0.Name: Iron stomach
VTE_IronStomach_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has never known nausea. Food poisoning and vomiting are foreign to {PAWN_objective}.

VTE_AnimalLover_0.Name: Animal lover
VTE_AnimalLover_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} can't stand cruelty toward animals. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier when nuzzled or acting as master to a tamed animal, but is more deeply upset when losing one. {PAWN_pronoun} also refuses to butcher animals.

VTE_AnimalHater_0.Name: Animal hater
VTE_AnimalHater_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes in human superiority over animals. {PAWN_pronoun} dislikes bonding or being nuzzled, but feels satisfaction when animals die or are sold.

VTE_BigBoned_0.Name: Big-boned
VTE_BigBoned_0.Description: Whether from bulk or awkward posture, {PAWN_nameDef} has broken a few chairs in {PAWN_possessive} time, and is likely to break more.

VTE_Rebel_0.Name: Rebel
VTE_Rebel_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] only plays by their own rules, and will roll their eyes and take it easy while doing any task they've been forced to do.

If imprisoned, [PAWN_pronoun] will be uncooperative with [PAWN_possessive] captors.

VTE_Submissive_0.Name: Submissive
VTE_Submissive_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] needs clear instructions on how, and when to do certain things and will only work at a normal speed when being forced to do something.

If imprisoned, [PAWN_pronoun] will be quite cooperative with [PAWN_possessive] captors.

VTE_Vengeful_0.Name: Vengeful
VTE_Vengeful_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is fueled by spite. {PAWN_pronoun} cant stand sharing the colony with rivals, and feels happier when one of them dies.

VTE_Technophobe_0.Name: Technophobe
VTE_Technophobe_0.Description: Whether from trauma or fear of change, {PAWN_nameDef} rejects modernity. {PAWN_pronoun} may lash out at machines, refuses to research, and feels satisfaction from destroying mechanoids.

VTE_FunLoving_0.Name: Fun-loving
VTE_FunLoving_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} lives for a good time. {PAWN_pronoun} remembers parties fondly, and the joy lasts far longer than it does for most.

VTE_Dunce_0.Name: Dunce
VTE_Dunce_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has limited mental capacity. {PAWN_pronoun} learns slowly and struggles with conversation, but tends to be naturally happy.

VTE_MartialArtist_0.Name: Martial artist
VTE_MartialArtist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has trained in melee combat and learned a special move to disarm opponents.

VTE_Snob_0.Name: Snob
VTE_Snob_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes they belong in high society, and loves nothing more than critiquing art and brushing elbows with royalty.

VTE_Squeamish_0.Name: Squeamish
VTE_Squeamish_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} gets a sour stomach around blood or corpses. Vomiting is just part of life for {PAWN_objective}.

VTE_Anxious_0.Name: Anxious
VTE_Anxious_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is naturally anxious, especially in social situations. {PAWN_pronoun} avoids gatherings and sometimes retreats to {PAWN_possessive} room to cope.

VTE_Insatiable_0.Name: Insatiable
VTE_Insatiable_0.Description: No amount of lovin is ever enough for {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} tends to move between partners and seeks intimacy often.

VTE_Prude_0.Name: Prude
VTE_Prude_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} gives {PAWN_possessive} body only to a spouse and would never initiate divorce. {PAWN_pronoun} also dislikes nudity more than most.

VTE_CouchPotato_0.Name: Couch potato
VTE_CouchPotato_0.Description: An armchair and a screen are all {PAWN_nameDef} needs to be happy. {PAWN_pronoun} never tires of watching television, and always feels good after.

VTE_CatPerson_0.Name: Cat person
VTE_CatPerson_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the company of cats and gravitates toward bonding with them, but dislikes dogs.

VTE_DogPerson_0.Name: Dog person
VTE_DogPerson_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the company of dogs and gravitates toward bonding with them, but dislikes cats.

VTE_Prodigy_0.Name: Prodigy
VTE_Prodigy_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a sharp, logical mind. {PAWN_pronoun} researches faster than most, and {PAWN_possessive} rational outlook makes {PAWN_objective} less prone to mental breaks.

VTE_Menagerist_0.Name: Menagerist
VTE_Menagerist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes animals are essential to life and society. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier with more of them around, and is especially skilled at taming and training.

VTE_ChildOfSea_0.Name: Ocean lover
VTE_ChildOfSea_0.Description: The sea calls to {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier when near the ocean or a deep river.

VTE_ChildOfMountain_0.Name: Mountain lover
VTE_ChildOfMountain_0.Description: The mountains call to {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier when near a large mountain.

VTE_MadSurgeon_0.Name: Mad surgeon
VTE_MadSurgeon_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} hides a twisted obsession. {PAWN_pronoun} treats organ harvesting as a dark experiment and takes pleasure in it. Harvesting makes {PAWN_objective} happy, but going too long without fuels growing unrest.

VTE_DrunkenMaster_0.Name: Drunken master
VTE_DrunkenMaster_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} fights best when drunk. {PAWN_pronoun} grows more dangerous in melee the more intoxicated {PAWN_pronoun} becomes.

VTE_Kleptomaniac_0.Name: Kleptomaniac
VTE_Kleptomaniac_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is compelled to steal, even from guests and allies, risking angering others.

VTE_Stoner_0.Name: Stoner
VTE_Stoner_0.Description: Smokeleaf is a way of life for {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} adores it and would rather die than give it up.

VTE_Lush_0.Name: Lush
VTE_Lush_0.Description: Alcohol is a way of life for {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} adores drinking and would rather die than give it up.

VTE_Wanderlust_0.Name: Wanderlust
VTE_Wanderlust_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves to travel and feels happiest on the move. {PAWN_pronoun} grows restless when staying too long in one place, but moves quickly and forages well while caravanning.

VTE_Insomniac_0.Name: Insomniac
VTE_Insomniac_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is never fully asleep or awake. {PAWN_pronoun} lurches along in a slow, shambler-like state, and only sleeps once every few days.

VTE_WorldWeary_0.Name: World weary
VTE_WorldWeary_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has grown tired of the world. {PAWN_pronoun} struggles with bleak thoughts, making {PAWN_possessive} personality difficult to befriend.

VTE_Desensitized_0.Name: Desensitized
VTE_Desensitized_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is hardened by old emotional trauma. {PAWN_pronoun} feels nothing from death or loss, whether animal, colonist, family, or prisoner.

VTE_RefinedPalate_0.Name: Refined palate
VTE_RefinedPalate_0.Description: Only the finest meals satisfy {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} feels indifferent toward ordinary food, but savors lavish meals and gains greater joy from them.

VTE_Academian_0.Name: Academian
VTE_Academian_0.Description: Through scholastic pursuit, {PAWN_nameDef} has become well-read. {PAWN_pronoun} excels in science and medicine, and tends patients with greater skill.

VTE_Groundbreaker_0.Name: Groundbreaker
VTE_Groundbreaker_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes infrastructure is everything. {PAWN_pronoun} is a natural builder and stoneworker, constructing and mining with greater speed and efficiency.

VTE_Gastronomist_0.Name: Gastronomist
VTE_Gastronomist_0.Description: To {PAWN_nameDef}, food is art. {PAWN_pronoun} creates beautiful, delicious meals that are almost always safe to eat.

VTE_Ecologist_0.Name: Ecologist
VTE_Ecologist_0.Description: Flora and fauna are vital to {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} uses every part of plants and animals, and appreciates natures gifts.

VTE_Tycoon_0.Name: Tycoon
VTE_Tycoon_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has an eye for silver and a silver tongue to match. {PAWN_pronoun} values {PAWN_possessive} own goods highly, and convinces others to do the same.

VTE_ThickSkinned_0.Name: Thick skinned
VTE_ThickSkinned_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is strangely hypercoagulating and will bleed much more slowly than most.

VTE_ThinSkinned_0.Name: Thin skinned
VTE_ThinSkinned_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is strangely hemophilic and tends to bleed much more profusely than others.

VTE_Schizoid_0.Name: Schizoid
VTE_Schizoid_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} bottles up {PAWN_possessive} feelings for long stretches of time. When the pressure grows too great, {PAWN_pronoun} may suddenly break down.

BOT_FamilyOriented_0.Name: Family oriented
BOT_FamilyOriented_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} values the concept of a family very highly, and likes to guide young minds. Knowing that the families in the colony are happy is important to them and being a parent is one of {PAWN_pronoun}'s dreams.

BOT_ChildHate_0.Name: Hates children
BOT_ChildHate_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} despises children. To {PAWN_pronoun} they're small, loud and obnoxious parasites that ruin every place they infest. {PAWN_nameDef} actively go out of {PAWN_pronoun}s way to avoid having children.

BOT_PressureCooker_0.Name: Pressure cooker
BOT_PressureCooker_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has issues letting their feelings bottle up and consequentially eventually explodes from all the stress. They'll break more often than normal pawns but they'll feel massive relief for a long period of time afterwards.

BOT_Composed_0.Name: Composed
BOT_Composed_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is able to keep cool under pressure, and will even perform better when there's a risk for mental breaks.

BOT_SoylentNeed_0.Name: Soylent need
BOT_SoylentNeed_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} tasted the green sludge once and can't get enough of it now. {PAWN_pronoun} will prefer to eat from a Nutrient Paste Dispenser over anything else.

BOT_AnimalWhisperer_0.Name: Animal whisperer
BOT_AnimalWhisperer_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is strangely proficient at dealing with animals of all kinds and sizes and never triggers attacks if taming attempts fail. {PAWN_pronoun} likes having animals in the colony, having bonded animals and especially loves getting nuzzled.

BOT_Dysgeusia_0.Name: Dysgeuisia
BOT_Dysgeusia_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} was born without a sense of taste and cannot enjoy food.

BOT_Eclectic_Palate_0.Name: Eclectic palate
BOT_Eclectic_Palate_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves to eat food with a variety of ingredients but will be upset over bland food.

BOT_Pacifist_0.Name: Pacifist
BOT_Pacifist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} hates violence and wouldn't hurt a fly. They'll get upset if forced to do so.

BOT_Narcoleptic_0.Name: Narcoleptic
BOT_Narcoleptic_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} suffers from a neurological disorder that makes {PAWN_pronoun} prone to randomly fall alseep anywhere.

BOT_Pyrophobia_0.Name: Pyrophobia
BOT_Pyrophobia_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is irrationally afraid of fire and will flee the scene if not drafted. {PAWN_pronoun} hates getting burns.

BOT_Nyctophobia_0.Name: Nyctophobia
BOT_Nyctophobia_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is afraid of the dark. They'll will be extra unhappy when in darkness and has trouble sleeping without light.

BOT_Loves_Sleeping_0.Name: Loves sleeping
BOT_Loves_Sleeping_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} always feels good after a good night's sleep.

BOT_StrongBody_-1.Name: Good Constitution
BOT_StrongBody_-1.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} was born with a strong, healthy body. They can carry more, mine faster, deal more damage in melee combat and take reduced damage from attacks.

BOT_WeakBody_1.Name: Poor Constitution
BOT_WeakBody_1.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} was unfortunately born with a weak, feeble body. They cannot carry as much as everyone else, mine slower, deal less damage in melee and take increased damage from attacks.

BOT_Apathetic_0.Name: Apathetic
BOT_Apathetic_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no goals in life. No dreams, motivation or passions. It's going to take a lot to break what is left of them.

BOT_Entomophobia_0.Name: Entomophobia
BOT_Entomophobia_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has an intense fear of insects and will not hesitate to run away upon spotting one.

BOT_Entomophagous_0.Name: Entomophagous
BOT_Entomophagous_0.Description: Having had easy access to insect meat during most of their life {PAWN_nameDef} became accustomed to eating it to the point that {PAWN_pronoun} preferred it over normal meat.

BOT_Gregarious_0.Name: Gregarious
BOT_Gregarious_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves the company of others. The more, the merrier.

BOT_Pluviophile_0.Name: Pluviophile
BOT_Pluviophile_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves the rain. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind being wet and gets happy during rainy weather.

BOT_Chionophile_0.Name: Chionophile
BOT_Chionophile_0.Description: There's nothing {PAWN_nameDef} loves more than snow! No amount of snow is going to slow them down.

BOT_Moody_0.Name: Moody
BOT_Moody_0.Description: It doesn't take much to make {PAWN_nameDef} either really excited or to bring {PAWN_possessive} mood completely down.

BOT_EarlyBird_0.Name: Early bird
BOT_EarlyBird_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} prefers to wake up early in the day to get as much work done as possible during the day.

{PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood boost if awake during the early hours of a day (5h-12h) and mood loss if awake during the evening (17h-0h).

BOT_Communal_0.Name: Communal
BOT_Communal_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has grown accustomed to a tightly nit colony and loves sleeping in barracks. Preferably with many other pawns.

BOT_Sadist_0.Name: Sadist
BOT_Sadist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} likes seeing other pawns suffer and gets excited from causing damage.

BOT_Vulgar_0.Name: Vulgar
BOT_Vulgar_0.Description: For whatever purpose, {PAWN_nameDef} has taught {PAWN_objective}self every swear word in the dictionary and uses this profane knowledge unconsciously in {PAWN_possessive} day-to-day life.

BOT_Comedian_0.Name: Comedian
BOT_Comedian_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} always tries to raise their fellow pawns' mood by telling jokes. Or try to, at least.

BOT_CongenitalAnalgesia_0.Name: Congenital analgesia
BOT_CongenitalAnalgesia_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} was born without the ability to feel pain. {PAWN_pronoun} is unable to experience psychic phenomena as a side effect.

BOT_GunCrazy_0.Name: Gun crazy
BOT_GunCrazy_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves guns! Especially shooting them. If {PAWN_pronoun} hits or not isn't important.

BOT_Hyperalgesia_0.Name: Hyperalgesia
BOT_Hyperalgesia_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a rare disorder that makes {PAWN_pronoun} extremely sensitive to pain, making anything painful so much worse.

BOT_Metabolism_0.Name: Fast metabolism
BOT_Metabolism_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s body works at a faster rate than a normal person, letting them heal faster at the cost of getting hungry quicker.

BOT_Metabolism_1.Name: Slow metabolism
BOT_Metabolism_1.Description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s body works at a slower rate than a normal person, healing much slower as a result. At least they don't eat as much.

BOT_Temperature_Love_-1.Name: Thermophile
BOT_Temperature_Love_-1.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} just loves the heat and won't suffer any negative thoughts related to being warm. {PAWN_pronoun} despises being cold, though.

BOT_Temperature_Love_1.Name: Cryophile
BOT_Temperature_Love_1.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} just loves the cold and won't suffer any negative thoughts related to being cold. {PAWN_pronoun} despises being warm, though.

HVT_Rambunctious_0.Name: Rambunctious
HVT_Rambunctious_0.Description: Sitting still is a frustrating chore for {PAWN_nameDef}. While praying, meditating, or even rarely while sleeping or resting, {PAWN_pronoun} may break out into an uncontrollable run.

HVT_ChronicNightmares_0.Name: Chronic nightmares
HVT_ChronicNightmares_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} never sleeps well. The longer {PAWN_pronoun} stays asleep, the worse {PAWN_possessive} mood will be on waking up.

HVT_VividDreams_0.Name: Vivid dreams
HVT_VividDreams_0.Description: After spending 6 continuous hours asleep, {PAWN_nameDef} enters an unusually potent dreaming state. Waking thereafter grants {PAWN_objective} mood and a chance to be inspired, both of which scale with additional time spent asleep.

EMWH_BlackCarapace_0.Name: Black carapace
EMWH_BlackCarapace_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has enhanced organ to wear the power armors.

EMWH_IronStomach_0.Name: Iron stomach
EMWH_IronStomach_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has strong stomach to reduce food poison chance.

EMWH_QuickDraw_0.Name: Quick draw
EMWH_QuickDraw_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is trained to draw their gun quickly.

EMWH_RapidReload_0.Name: Rapid reload
EMWH_RapidReload_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is trained to reload their gun quickly.

EMWH_Maccabian_0.Name: Maccabian
EMWH_Maccabian_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} was born in barren world hence has better cold insulation in exchange of shooting accuracy.

WH40kVoidhand_0.Name: Voidhand
WH40kVoidhand_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is used to life aboard a voidship or station and has no need to experience the outdoors or light. {PAWN_pronoun} will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever and is not bothered by darkness. However, {PAWN_nameDef} will be unhappy while outdoors.

WH40kMutant_0.Name: Mutant
WH40kMutant_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a mutant whose very appearance repulses most people, but the mutations don't go any deeper than that. Such 'twists' are tolerated - just - in the Imperium, and often form an underclass.
